channel.title: Itemhandler error when runserver
channel.description:
[code] kingsplayground v2 Is currently running! Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 17 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:346) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:39) at server.main(server.java:27[/code] HOW DO I FIX THIS???? i was told i put to many objects in a shop, i deleted and still had the troubles.. then i used the the original files and still had same problem!!?? yeah call me a "noob, nub newb (personal favorite)n0ob?" whatever just help me fix it
REPOST>>

item.title: Itemhandler error when runserver
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

You edited a .cfg file while using spaces. Use tabs.

Read full topic

item.title: Itemhandler error when runserver
item.dc:creator: @kingofnone kingofnone
item.description:
@kingofnone wrote:

spaces…? okay but i never touched the itemhandler…?

item.title: Itemhandler error when runserver
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

You used spaces instead of tabs. NEVER use spaces.

Read full topic

item.title: Itemhandler error when runserver
item.dc:creator: @Master_Monk Master Monk
item.description:
@Master_Monk wrote:

Well, whoever told you that you had to many shops was wrong.
you did something wrong in itemhandler.java.
